projects.title: Skyglow Estimation Toolbox
projects.desc: Measuring regional light pollution using NASA satellite data. Used to help monitor and protect national parks and wildlife.

projects.title: Asteroid 2000 JQ66
projects.cap: Determining the Orbit of a Near-Earth Asteroid
projects.desc: Program written in Python to calculate and visualize the orbit of a near-Earth asteroid using original observations. Part of Summer Science Program (SSP) '16.
